body.name: Crystli Queen Size Mattress Bed in A Box, 10 Inch Hybrid Mattress with Zero Pressure Foam, Innerspring Mattress for Pressure Relief & Cool Sleep, Motion Isolation, Medium Firm, CertiPUR-US Certified
body.stockDetail: Only 13 left in stock - order soon.
features: Better Pressure Relief and Balance Support: Experienced most comfortable sleep with the all-new design CertiPUR-US Certified zero pressure foam by Crystli. The zero pressure foam provides you a weightlessly sleep by absorbs and disperses your body pressure and fits perfectly for all kinds of body shape. With combination of zero gravity foam, air wave shape support foam, high-density based foam and high-quality steel coil base, it is more supportive and comfortable than ordinary mattress.

Cooler Sleep and Motion Isolation: The rayon fabric cover is breathable, soft, skin-friendly which can help release moisture and sweat and the airflow through wrapped spring mattresses allows you to sleep cooler and wake up more refreshed. Less motion will be transferred with the individually–encased steel coil based.

Universal Medium Feel and Pain-free: Not too soft and not too firm, this mattress falls right into the sweet spot of perfectly comfortable for sleepers of all styles and preferences. A thick layer of memory foam conforms to your body to align the spine for comfort that leaves you rested and pain-free. Fits all kinds of sleeper.

Stronger Edge Support and Long-Lasting Durability: The dual edge support design ensures the firmness of this mattress. It provides solid support to sleepers without rolling off. Premium memory foam and steel coil used in it which easily matches the lifespan of the ordinary mattress.

Bed in A Box, Easy to Set Up: The 10 Inch queen size mattress is rolled and compressed in a box for shipping. Setting them up at home is an easy task. They are compatible with most of bed frames and can be used without a spring box. Unseal the mattress and let it inflate for about 72 hours for full expansion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Buy It!
reviews.reviewText: I honestly don’t write Amazon reviews all that often, but I was pleasantly surprised with this mattress. For the price, I wasn’t expecting much because of how expensive name brand mattresses are, but it’s is crazy comfortable. Easily one of the best mattresses that I have ever bought. I’m going to use this one until it wears out, and then I’ll buy another. If you’re even on the fence, go for it because the value/cost ratio is high on the value end.The packaging was great, they even included a tool specifically for cutting the outer layer of plastic. One of the best purchases I’ve made on Amazon hands down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delivered on schedule. Easy to put together when following instructions. I'm a petite woman being 5'3 I was able to do it on my own. I opened box in room it was going in. I then placed vacuum sealed product on bed frame. After that follow instructions by opening packaging one layer at a time. After all packaging was removed we waited 72hrs to fully expand. It was worth the wait of 72hrs. The bed is so comfortable. My husband said, we should order more for other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bed is firm which I need because of back issues but it is also comfortable. Really has helped my back as I weigh 230 lbs and still get good support!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the money, but edges are very soft.
reviews.reviewText: Is very easy to put together. It’s very comfortable however, the edges of the mattress are weak not much support, so avoid sitting or leaning in the corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: It's a very comfortable mattress! I would recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was very skeptical before ordering as I've never ordered a bed online without seeing or trying out first. Once received I was not super impressed originally but after a few days of it filling out fully it was much much better! Not sure about Ling term obviously but it's in a guest room so it's not that important. We added a 3" foam/gel topper and omg! What a difference. My master bedroom is under remodeling so I've spent 5 days sleeping in this bed and its great! Would buy again in a heartbeat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When you exit any side of the bed it crunches down where you can't get off the bed in a safe sturdy way. I've slipped off more than once. Also, I ordered medium, yet there's no top softness. I would not purchase again or recommend. I threw away my old bed, so I'm stuck and very unhappy in my unsafe bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mattress for your child’s first big bed!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this mattress in November for my daughters first big girl bed (she’s 4). We went with the 10 inch and purchased a frame as well from Amazon. When the mattress arrived, it came nicely rolled up into a smaller than expected box, but was very heavy. Took my husband and I both to carry it upstairs but that wasn’t surprising seeing as it was a whole full size mattress stuffed into a box. We unboxed it, laid it out in a spare bedroom and cut the plastic to allow it to expand. We did not have any chemical smell like some people mention with these boxed mattresses but we still left it to expand and air out for a few days. By the time we were ready to move it, it was fully expanded and looked like a normal box-store mattress! Moved easily from one room to the other. Normal full/queen sheet set and comforter fit great. After laying on it with my daughter every night for a month, I can definitely say this is a great first mattress for any child! It is definitely firm, so if you are used to a soft bed, this may not be for you (I have a pillow top mattress so I don’t think I could sleep on this full time), but after a month of use I can honestly say my daughter sleeps like a rock on this thing! My favorite feature is that it is a hybrid, so it has coils as well as the foam. The coils allow me to lay in bed with her until she dozes off and let’s me sneak off the bed without any movement or squeaks from the mattress.

The reviews are pretty mixed on this mattress but I'm certain me and my husband LOVE it!We bought this 3 months ago and have slept on it every night since, the mattress is decently firm, you don't sink too far into it but it's very comfortable. The springs aren't loud, we don't really notice eachother moving around at night and the corners are designed in a way that our sheets never seem to pop off the corners or anything (which was a big issue with our last mattress). The price of the mattress is unmatched, we ended up going for this one over our other top choice of a $1,800 mattress but this one is genuinely the exact same. It doesn't hold heat, it's easy to clean, it's bouncy and lastly the smell leaves really quick. We love it and can't recommend it enough.

I got a bunk bed for my children. I used old one I had before , it heavy to carry to new places. But This mattress is very easy to unpack and unroll. Also is soft and comfortable. No bad smell at all. Two girls take turn to slept on it. And they love it. Better than other one we had before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: For those who need a firm but comfortable mattress - this is the one.
reviews.reviewText: Delivered on time, undamaged, in a box. Packaging easy to remove with tool provided, mattress looked great and gives good nights of sleeping.

I was searching new mattress for a while, as I wanted to have good one on a reasonable price. It’s a medium firmness. Soft and comfy, but with some support. I was amazed at the thickness once it expanded. I really like the low motion transfer feature. Made of good material. Overall very happy with this mattress.

The mattress is very comfortable. I love those hybrid one instead of pure spring mattress. The mattress takes about a full day to fully inflate back to its original thickness (10"). So I just cut the package open and laid it flat on the bedroom floorThe mattress has no chemical smell at all so it's good for anyone who's allergic to chemical
